T02TD1335E:307a-1: sarba p'a pam shuddha aagni p'u dzan'a ma sa m'a dhi /
T02TD1335E:307a-3: sdig pa thams cad 'dag pa'i me'i mchod pa'i ting nga 'dzin zhes bya ba //
T02TD1335E:307b-0: @307b dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1335E:307b-1: ma h'a mu dra ti la las //
T02TD1335E:307b-2: byung ba'i khang pa brtsegs ma ru //
T02TD1335E:307b-3: snying rje byang chub sems ldan pas //
T02TD1335E:307b-4: bdud rtsi lnga yis khrus byas te //
T02TD1335E:307b-5: sngags ni bye ba bzlas par bya //
T02TD1335E:307b-6: aom badzra na la ka mre ta ma la na dhe ro te da ra ro ro ga sv'a h'a /
T02TD1335E:307b-8: bdag la lung rtsol sbyin byed ma //
T02TD1335E:307b-9: bcu drug lon pa'i mtshan bzang mo //
T02TD1335E:307b-10: si la ga pur mang yod pa //
T02TD1335E:307b-11: kye bu 'di khyer sbyor ba gyis //
T02TD1335E:307b-12: lung ston thob pa'i bu mo la //
T02TD1335E:307b-13: dbang bskur rtsa ba'i rgyu 'bras bshad //
T02TD1335E:307b-14: shin tu dben pa'i gnas dag tu //
T02TD1335E:307b-15: n+ya gro dha la la bzhugs te //
T02TD1335E:307b-16: rtog pa'i khams la rnal 'byor bya //
T02TD1335E:307b-17: dus kyang ngal so mnyam par gzung //
T02TD1335E:307b-18: rdul gyis me spar dngos po sbyar //
T02TD1335E:307b-19: yam shing me spar dkyil 'khor gsal //
T02TD1335E:307b-20: sreg rdzas padma'i mar gzhu ste //
T02TD1335E:307b-21: dgang gzar ham las rdo rje dgang //
T02TD1335E:307b-22: hom khung phyi rol 'dzag mi bya //
T02TD1335E:307b-23: reg bya med pa'i mchod pa yis //
T02TD1335E:307b-24: rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lha rnams dang //
T02TD1335E:307b-26: nya la thug nas gshegs su gsol //
T02TD1335E:307b-27: bsam pa thams cad 'grub pa dang //
T02TD1335E:307b-28: chos sku thob par the tshom med //
T02TD1335E:307b-29: mar me rdzas rnyed ji bzhin du //
T02TD1335E:307b-30: dus thams cad du mi gnas pa'o //
T02TD1335E:307b-31: lus ni nan tan gang byed pa //
T02TD1335E:307b-32: rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor yin zhes bya'o //
T02TD1335E:307b-33: sbyin sreg gsang ba'i man ngag rin chen rdo rje dpal gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
